scripts.start: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo serve --config opensource.yml,_config.yml
scripts.start:enterprise: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo serve --config enterprise.yml,_config.yml
scripts.server: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo serve --config opensource.yml,_config.yml
scripts.server:enterprise: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo serve --config enterprise.yml,_config.yml
scripts.publish: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo generate --config opensource.yml,_config.yml && hexo deploy --config opensource.yml,_config.yml
scripts.publish:enterprise: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo generate --config enterprise.yml,_config.yml && hexo deploy --config enterprise.yml,_config.yml
scripts.build: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo generate --config opensource.yml,_config.yml
scripts.build:enterprise: hexo clean && touch db.json && hexo generate --config enterprise.yml,_config.yml
